Package sep4.iot.gateway.webSocket

Class WebSocketClient

java.lang.Object
sep4.iot.gateway.webSocket.WebSocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.net.http.WebSocket.Listener
public class WebSocketClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.net.http.WebSocket.Listener
WebSocket listener class used for the connection between the Gateway server and Loriot server
Since:
26-05-2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daria Popa, Natali Munk-Jakobsen

    • getUpLink

      public java.lang.String getUpLink()

      Returns:
      - the oldest data String from the list

    • onClose

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<?> onClose​(java.net.http.WebSocket webSocket, int statusCode, java.lang.String reason)
      Method called when the connection is closed
      Specified by:
      onClose in interface java.net.http.WebSocket.Listener
      Parameters:
      webSocket - the web socket where the connection was closed
      statusCode - the status code for the closing error/message
      reason - the reason the connection was closed
      Returns:
      a completion stage which prints out a message in the console at the end

      Parameters:

    • onText

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<?> onText​(java.net.http.WebSocket webSocket, java.lang.CharSequence data, boolean last)
      Method called when new information is heard in the Loriot network server
      Specified by:
      onText in interface java.net.http.WebSocket.Listener
      Parameters:
      webSocket - - the web socket connected to
      data - - the received data
      last - - a boolean representing if the message was the last one received
      Returns:
      a completion stage action i.e printing out a message
